title: Backstabbers in league of legends
body:
_Name removed_ is one of the biggest dogs in the world. thought he was my friend but he didnt trust me that i was gonna give him back riven in URF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Raising awareness for anyone who comes across this fellow ever in game! :(********feggghejqfj********
*update
HES A DIRTY DOGGGGGGGGGG

replies.body: I thought this was going to be a post about shaco's passive but okay.
LOL, what a guy, actually responded, also not allowed to "expose" anyone so this post is gonna get removed
This is naming and shaming which is not allowed

like that time when i gifted someone bc i thought they were a good guy and they turned out to be a total asshole and repeatedly spammed me asking for more before trying to scam me with a curse voice beta code that's worth absolutely nothing :P
lmao unlucky bro! hate guys like that
Remove the name. It violates the rules.
